titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of October 20, 2015, as the "National Day on Writing".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of October 20, 2015, as the "National Day on Writing".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Expresses the Senate's support for the designation of October 20, 2015, as the National Day on Writing.
